item.title: Want to understand feature learning and the final network weights?
item.description: How neural networks learn features and the mathematical structure of final network weights.

item.title: Want to understand the convergence and stability of optimization?
item.description: Mathematical analysis of optimization algorithms in deep learning and their convergence properties.

item.title: Want to understand the structure in the data?
item.description: How deep networks discover and exploit structural patterns in high-dimensional data.

item.title: Want to understand hyperparameter selection (and why should theorists care)?
item.description: The theoretical foundations of hyperparameter optimization and its importance for understanding deep learning.

item.title: Want to understand generalization?
item.description: The mathematical theory behind why deep networks generalize well to unseen data.

item.title: Introduction: what do you want to understand?
Want to understand the average size of hidden representations?
item.description: Exploring the mathematical properties of hidden layer representations and their average magnitudes.

item.title: Want to understand neuron-level sparsity?
item.description: Mathematical analysis of sparsity patterns in neural network activations and weights.
